_metadata.prd_section: P1 - Web Interface and Advanced Features
_metadata.description: HTTP API, web interface, and advanced campaign management features

requirements.title: HTTP API Endpoints
requirements.description: Provide HTTP API endpoints for web interface and external integrations with CRUD operations for campaigns

validation.notes: Multiple tests validate HTTP API responses, CRUD operations, CORS, error handling [REQ:VT-REQ-006]
E2E workflow validates HTTP API endpoints in complete lifecycle
E2E workflow validates HTTP API endpoints for staleness operations

requirements.title: File Prioritization API
requirements.description: Provide sorted lists of least visited and most stale files to guide agent analysis workflows

validation.notes: Multiple tests validate prioritization queries with various limits and edge cases [REQ:VT-REQ-009]
E2E workflow validates prioritization API (least-visited, most-stale queries)
Dedicated E2E workflow validates staleness-based prioritization
User journey validates prioritization in realistic workflow

requirements.title: Campaign Export/Import API
requirements.description: Export and import campaign data for backup, sharing, and migration between environments

validation.notes: TestImportHandler validates campaign import and data preservation [REQ:VT-REQ-008]

requirements.title: Web Interface Dashboard
requirements.description: Build web interface for manual campaign management and visualization of staleness metrics

validation.notes: 19 unit tests validate UI server functionality, routing, and API integration [REQ:VT-REQ-009]
E2E UI workflow validates campaign dashboard interface
User journey validates dashboard in realistic usage context

requirements.title: Campaign Detail View
requirements.description: Provide detailed campaign view with file list, staleness visualization, and visit tracking

validation.notes: Unit tests validate campaign detail page server logic [REQ:VT-REQ-010]
Unit tests validate export handler functionality [REQ:VT-REQ-010]
User journey validates campaign detail view in UI
